thread.section_title: Prestige Flowers Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.prestigeflowers.co.uk
thread.title: Tamzin Victoria Rees
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Tamzin Victoria Rees

author: Tamzin Victoria Rees
title: Tamzin Victoria Rees
text: I received the flowers the correct day and was pleased however when I opened them they were mainly dull grayish colours and half dead and nothing like the picture they were squashed and starting to smell rotten, absolutely Appalling for the price paid don't waste your time or money on this scam of a company!!
